TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Deadly matter in this site has been observed consistently rising with the <color=lightblue>Attlerock's</color> gravity as it orbits overhead.
CASSAVA: Hypothesis confirmed: the matter obeys (and can be competitively manipulated) by both natural and artificial sources of gravity.
CASSAVA: ..I must proceed with the <color=orange>Inspired project</color> in the time I have left.
